name: Schema Pruning: Remove Unneeded Types
description: Based on the usage distribution and definition descriptions of entities/relations, output a list of entity or relation types that should be deleted. Only output necessary removals, without proposing merging/renaming/adding solutions.

variables.name: entity_type_distribution
variables.description: Entity type usage distribution (should include: type→count, ratio, doc_coverage, etc.)

variables.name: relation_type_distribution
variables.description: Relation type usage distribution (should include: type→count, ratio, doc_coverage, domain/range misuse rates, etc.)

variables.name: entity_type_description_text
variables.description: Entity types and their definition descriptions (text or table converted to text)

variables.name: relation_type_description_text
variables.description: Relation types and their definition descriptions (text or table converted to text)
